about_the_game:
Warplock began as a small personal project in my first year at college. Over my time as a student I continued working on it and devoting more and more time to it. With the help of my girlfriend, I have been able to create the game that it is now. Warplock is a top-down action roleplaying game. The goal? To beat each biome. Along the way you will find various upgrades and items you can pick up. You will cast spells and destroy monsters who pray on your demise. When all is said and done, you return back to your home base to restore your health and magic and place the necessary upgrades before returning back to the wilderness.

We at Quackpot Studios hope that you enjoy.

-quack quack.

Warplock began as a small personal project in my first year at college. Over my time as a student I continued working on it and devoting more and more time to it. With the help of my girlfriend, I have been able to create the game that it is now. Warplock is a top-down action roleplaying game. The goal? To beat each biome. Along the way you will find various upgrades and items you can pick up. You will cast spells and destroy monsters who pray on your demise. When all is said and done, you return back to your home base to restore your health and magic and place the necessary upgrades before returning back to the wilderness.

We at Quackpot Studios hope that you enjoy.

-quack quack.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu Linux
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000

name: Warplock

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: A randomly generated action rogue-like, where you will rely on the use of magic and portals to warp your way through endless waves of hostile magical beings.
